autotransform.scripts.commands package

Submodules

autotransform.scripts.commands.config module

The config command is used to update or list existing config values.

autotransform.scripts.commands.config.add_args(parser: argparse.ArgumentParser) → None

Adds the args to a subparser that are required to run the config comand.

Parameters

parser (ArgumentParser) – The parser for the config command.

autotransform.scripts.commands.config.config_command_main(args: argparse.Namespace) → None

The main method for the config command, handles updating the config with new values or listing existing config values.

Parameters

args (Namespace) – The arguments supplied to the run command, such as the schema and worker type

autotransform.scripts.commands.run module

The run command is used to execute a full run of a schema, either locally or by kicking off a remote job.

autotransform.scripts.commands.run.add_args(parser: argparse.ArgumentParser) → None

Adds the args to a subparser that are required to run a schema.

Parameters

parser (ArgumentParser) – The parser for the schema run.

autotransform.scripts.commands.run.run_command_main(args: argparse.Namespace) → None

The main method for the run command, handles the actual execution of a run.

Parameters

args (Namespace) – The arguments supplied to the run command, such as the schema.

Module contents

A package containing the commands used by the main script.
